attributes.action: Stop the ability to delay 63 local council elections.
attributes.additional_details: Having already had our local elections delayed it appears that the government is attempting to delay them again thus denying us the right to choose who governs us.
attributes.background: I would like the government to give us the right to vote in local elections.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747234
